file_content.text: Your attempt to steal Imperial property has been detected, and reinforcements called from all nearby positions.
Drop your weapons and enter Imperial custody or face termination.
I'm sure we can negotiate reasonably.
We're Havoc Squad. Nobody you send can handle us.
Don't you know who we are?
I'm the commander of Havoc Squad. Your reinforcements won't be enough.
Don't you know who I am?
Havoc Squad? Excellent. This victory will be celebrated.
The more Imps you send, the more I get to kill.
You had your chance--now be crushed by the might of the Empire.
